searchSql.baseSql:
SELECT A.CASE_CODE, A.CCAI_CODE, pro.PROPERTY_ADDR, (SELECT GUEST_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO WHERE CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND TRANS_POSITION = '30006001') SELLER, (SELECT GUEST_PHONE FROM sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO WHERE CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND TRANS_POSITION = '30006001') SELLER_PHONE, (SELECT GUEST_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO WHERE CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND TRANS_POSITION = '30006002') BUYER, (SELECT GUEST_PHONE FROM sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO WHERE CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND TRANS_POSITION = '30006002') BUYER_PHONE, (SELECT REAL_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE_PARTICIPANT WHERE CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND POSITION = 'agent') AGENT_NAME, (SELECT GRP_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE_PARTICIPANT WHERE CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND POSITION = 'agent') AGENT_GRP_NAME, (SELECT GRP_MGR_REALNAME FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE_PARTICIPANT WHERE CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND POSITION = 'agent') AGENT_MANAGER, (SELECT REAL_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE_PARTICIPANT WHERE CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND POSITION = 'loan') LOAN, (SELECT REAL_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE_PARTICIPANT WHERE CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND POSITION = 'warrant') WARRANT, (SELECT REAL_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE_PARTICIPANT WHERE CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND POSITION = 'assistant') ASSISTANT, (SELECT REAL_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE_PARTICIPANT WHERE CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND POSITION = 'secretary') SECRETARY, A.CASE_PROPERTY CASE_PROPERTY_DICT, A.STATUS STATUS_DICT, mort.MORT_TYPE MORT_TYPE_DICT, CAST(mort.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT/10000 AS DECIMAL(18,2)) MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT, CAST(mort.COM_AMOUNT/10000 AS DECIMAL(18,2)) COM_AMOUNT, CAST(mort.PRF_AMOUNT/10000 AS DECIMAL(18,2)) PRF_AMOUNT, (SELECT FIN_ORG_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG WHERE FIN_ORG_CODE = mort.FIN_ORG_CODE) BANK_NAME, tg.GUEST_NAME CUST_NAME, tg.GUEST_PHONE CUST_PHONE, (SELECT FIN_ORG_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG WHERE FIN_ORG_CODE = tr.FIN_ORG_ID) EVA_NAME, mort.LOANER_NAME, mort.LOANER_PHONE, mort.COM_DISCOUNT, CAST(sign.CON_PRICE / 10000 AS DECIMAL(18,2)) CON_PRICE, CAST(sign.REAL_PRICE / 10000 AS DECIMAL(18,2)) REAL_PRICE, R.PROCESS_TIME REC_DATE, G.REAL_CON_TIME NET_SIGN_DATE, H.REAL_HT_TIME GUOHU_DATE, I.REAL_PROPERTY_GET_TIME LZ_DATE, mort.SIGN_DATE, mort.LEND_DATE, A.ClOSE_TIME CLOSE_DATE FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE A INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO B ON A.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO pro ON A.CASE_CODE = pro.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE mort ON A.CASE_CODE = mort.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO tg ON tg.PKID = mort.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_EVA_REPORT_PROCESS tr ON A.CASE_CODE = tr.CASE_CODE AND tr.STATUS = '4' LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_SIGN sign ON A.CASE_CODE = sign.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE_RECV R ON A.CASE_CODE = R.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_SIGN G ON A.CASE_CODE = G.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER H ON A.CASE_CODE = H.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_GET_PROPERTY_BOOK I ON A.CASE_CODE = I.CASE_CODE WHERE ( EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_CASE C WHERE C.CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE <ifNotNull idflag> and C.LEADING_PROCESS_ID = #userId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull queryorgs> AND C.ORG_ID in (#queryorgs#) </ifNotNull> ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR C WHERE C.CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE <ifNotNull idflag> and C.PROCESSOR_ID = #userId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull queryorgs> AND C.ORG_ID in (#queryorgs#) </ifNotNull> ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR G INNER JOIN ( SELECT T.CASE_CODE,T.NEW_ASSIGNEE,S.id FROM SCTRANS.T_TL_TASK_REASSIGNT_LOG T LEFT JOIN sctrans.SYS_USER S ON t.ORI_ASSIGNEE = S.username ) L ON L.id = G.PROCESSOR_ID and L.case_code = G.case_code <ifNotNull userLoginName> AND L.NEW_ASSIGNEE = #userLoginName# </ifNotNull> WHERE A.CASE_CODE = G.CASE_CODE AND G.SRV_CODE IN ( '3000400201', '3000401002' ) ) ) <ifNotNull isNotResearchCloseCase> AND A.CASE_PROPERTY != '30003002' </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull yuCuiOriGrpId> AND EXISTS ( SELECT F.CASE_CODE,F.ORG_ID FROM ( SELECT C.CASE_CODE,C.ORG_ID FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_CASE C WHERE C.CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE UNION SELECT P.CASE_CODE,P.ORG_ID FROM SCTRANS.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR P WHERE P.CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE ) F INNER JOIN SCTRANS.SYS_ORG AS YCORG ON F.ORG_ID = YCORG.ID WHERE (YCORG.ID = #yuCuiOriGrpId# OR YCORG.PARENT_ID = #yuCuiOriGrpId#) ) </ifNotNull> <choose> <when test ="isSubscribeFilter==0"> AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_MODULE_SUBSCRIBE ttms WHERE ttms.SUBSCRIBER_ID=:sessionUserId and ttms.MODULE_CODE=A.CASE_CODE ) </when> <when test ="isSubscribeFilter==1"> AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_MODULE_SUBSCRIBE ttms WHERE ttms.SUBSCRIBER_ID=:sessionUserId and ttms.MODULE_CODE=A.CASE_CODE ) </when> </choose> <choose> <when test ="mortageType==0"> AND A.STATUS != '30001001' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE WHERE IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE ) </when> <when test ="mortageType==1"> AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE WHERE MORT_TYPE IN ('30016001','30016002') AND IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE ) </when> <when test ="mortageType==2"> AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE WHERE MORT_TYPE = '30016003' AND IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE ) </when> <when test ="mortageType==3"> AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE WHERE MORT_TYPE IN ('30016001','30016002') AND IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE ) </when> <when test ="mortageType==4"> AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE_TOSAVE WHERE SELF_MORT = 1 AND CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE ) </when> </choose> AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO WHERE CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE <ifNotNull propertyAddr> AND PROPERTY_ADDR like '%' + #propertyAddr# + '%' </ifNotNull> ) <ifNotNull guestname> AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO WHERE CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE and GUEST_NAME LIKE '%'+#guestname#+'%' ) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull proName> AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE_PARTICIPANT WHERE CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND POSITION IN('warrant','loan') AND USER_NAME = #proName#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull agentOrgName> AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.V_USER_ORG_JOB uoj where uoj.user_id = B.AGENT_CODE AND uoj.org_id = #agentOrgName# ) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode1> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode1#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode2> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode2#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode3> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode3#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode4> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode4#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode5> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode5#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode6> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode6#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode7> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode7#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode8> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode8#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode9> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode9#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode10> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode10#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode11> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode11#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode12> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode12#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode13> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode13#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode14> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode14#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode15> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode15#) </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull recTimeStart> AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE_RECV R WHERE A.CASE_CODE = R.CASE_CODE AND R.PROCESS_TIME >= #recTimeStart#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull recTimeEnd> AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE_RECV R WHERE A.CASE_CODE = R.CASE_CODE AND R.PROCESS_TIME <= #recTimeEnd#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull netSignTimeStart> AND EXISTS(select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_SIGN G where A.CASE_CODE = G.CASE_CODE AND G.REAL_CON_TIME >= #netSignTimeStart#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull netSignTimeEnd> AND EXISTS(select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_SIGN G where A.CASE_CODE = G.CASE_CODE AND G.REAL_CON_TIME <= #netSignTimeEnd#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull guohuTimeStart> AND EXISTS(select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER H where A.CASE_CODE = H.CASE_CODE and H.REAL_HT_TIME >= #guohuTimeStart#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull guohuTimeEnd> AND EXISTS(select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER H where A.CASE_CODE = H.CASE_CODE AND H.REAL_HT_TIME <= #guohuTimeEnd#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull lzTimeStart> AND EXISTS(select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_GET_PROPERTY_BOOK I where A.CASE_CODE = I.CASE_CODE AND I.REAL_PROPERTY_GET_TIME >= #lzTimeStart#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull lzTimeEnd> AND EXISTS(select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_GET_PROPERTY_BOOK I where A.CASE_CODE = I.CASE_CODE AND I.REAL_PROPERTY_GET_TIME <= #lzTimeEnd#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signlendDate> AND EXISTS ( select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE J where A.CASE_CODE = J.CASE_CODE and is_active='1' </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signTimeStart> AND J.SIGN_DATE >= #signTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signTimeEnd> and J.SIGN_DATE <= #signTimeEnd# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull lendTimeStart> and J.LEND_DATE >= #lendTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull lendTimeEnd> and J.LEND_DATE <= #lendTimeEnd# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signlendDate> ) </ifNotNull>

SELECT B.CASE_CODE, B.CTM_CODE, B.CASE_STATUS, B.CASE_STATUS_CN,--分单 B.CASE_PROPERTY, B.CASE_PROPERTY_CN,--在途等 B.CASE_ORIGIN, B.CASE_CREATE_TIME,
--查询 B.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F, B.CASE_ORG_ID_F, B.CASE_ISSUBSCRIBE, B.CASE_LOAN_REQ, B.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_B, B.GROUP_ORG_ID, --经纪人orgid B.TRANSFER_APP_TIME, B.SIGN_HOUSE_QUANTITY_CN,
B.CASE_DISPATCH_TIME, B.CASE_REAL_NAME_F, B.CASE_EMPLOYEE_CODE_F, B.CASE_ORG_NAME_F, B.CASE_MANAGER_REAL_NAME, B.CASE_ASSISTANT_REAL_NAME, B.CASE_DISTRICT_NAME, B.CASE_SRV_NAME, B.CASE_SRV_REAL_NAME, B.CASE_SRV_ORG_NAME, B.HOUSR_PROPERTY_ADDR, B.GUEST_NAME_UP, B.GUEST_PHONE_UP, B.GUEST_NAME_DOWN, B.GUEST_PHONE_DOWN, B.BA_NAME,--大区 B.AGENT_NAME, B.AGENT_PHONE, B.AGENT_EMPLOYEE_CODE, B.GRP_NAME, B.JFHJL_NAME, B.JFHJL_EMPLOYEE_CODE, B.JQYJL_NAME, B.JQYJL_EMPLOYEE_CODE, B.JQYZJ_NAME, B.JQYZJ_EMPLOYEE_CODE, B.JQYDS_NAME, B.JQYDS_EMPLOYEE_CODE, B.CASE_EVA_COMPANY, B.MORT_FIN_BRANCH_NAME, B.MORT_FIN_SUB_BRANCH_NAME, B.MORT_SIGN_DATE, B.MORT_APPR_DATE, B.MORT_LEND_DATE, B.MORT_COM_DISCOUNT,--折扣率 B.CASE_LOAN_REQ_CN,--是否贷款 B.MORT_TYPE, B.MORT_TYPE_CN, B.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI_CN, CAST(B.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT / 10000 AS DECIMAL(18,2)) as MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT, CAST(B.MORT_COM_AMOUNT / 10000 AS DECIMAL(18,2)) as MORT_COM_AMOUNT, CAST(B.MORT_PRF_AMOUNT / 10000 AS DECIMAL(18,2)) as MORT_PRF_AMOUNT, B.MORT_LOANER_NAME, B.IS_LOANER_ARRIVE_CN, B.MORT_CUST_NAME, B.MORT_CUST_PHONE, B.LOAN_REC_LETTER_NO, B.LOAN_LOST_CONFIRM_CODE, B.LOAN_SELF_DEL_REASON, B.LOAN_LOST_APPLY_REASON, B.CASE_REAL_CON_TIME, B.CASE_TAX_TIME, B.CASE_PRICING_TIME, B.CASE_REAL_PLS_TIME, B.TRANSFER_REAL_HT_TIME, B.TRANSFER_CREATE_TIME, B.TRANSFER_COMMENT, B.TRANSFER_HOUSE_HODING_TAX, B.TRANSFER_PERSONAL_INCOME_TAX, B.TRANSFER_BUSINESS_TAX, B.TRANSFER_CONTRACT_TAX, B.TRANSFER_LAND_INCREMENT_TAX, B.TAX_HOUSE_HODING_TAX, B.TAX_PERSONAL_INCOME_TAX, B.TAX_BUSINESS_TAX, B.TAX_CONTRACT_TAX, B.TAX_LAND_INCREMENT_TAX,
B.CASE_REAL_PROPERTY_GET_TIME, B.CASE_CLOSE_TIME, CAST(B.CASE_REAL_PRICE / 10000 AS DECIMAL(18,2)) as CASE_REAL_PRICE, CAST(B.CASE_CON_PRICE / 10000 AS DECIMAL(18,2)) as CASE_CON_PRICE, B.CASE_TAX_PRICING, B.CASE_HOUSE_UNIT_PRICE, B.SPV_TYPE_CN, B.SPV_AMOUNT, B.SPV_SIGN_TIME, B.EVA_EVAL_FEE, B.EVA_RECORD_TIME
FROM sctrans.T_RPT_CASE_BASE_INFO B
WHERE 1=1 AND
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_CASE C WHERE C.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE <ifNotNull idflag> and C.LEADING_PROCESS_ID = #userId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull queryorgs> AND C.ORG_ID in (#queryorgs#) </ifNotNull>) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR C WHERE C.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE <ifNotNull idflag> and C.PROCESSOR_ID = #userId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull queryorgs> AND C.ORG_ID in (#queryorgs#) </ifNotNull>) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR A INNER JOIN ( SELECT T.*,S.id FROM SCTRANS.T_TL_TASK_REASSIGNT_LOG T LEFT JOIN sctrans.SYS_USER S ON t.ORI_ASSIGNEE = S.username ) L ON L.id = A.PROCESSOR_ID and L.CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE <ifNotNull userLoginName> AND L.NEW_ASSIGNEE = #userLoginName#</ifNotNull> WHERE B.CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND A.SRV_CODE IN ( '3000400201', '3000401002' ) ) )
<if test="isSubscribeFilter != '-1' "> AND B.CASE_ISSUBSCRIBE = #isSubscribeFilter# </if>
<if test="caseOriginType != null and caseOriginType !='' "> AND B.CASE_ORIGIN = #caseOriginType# </if>
<if test="caseProperty != null and caseProperty !='' "> AND B.CASE_PROPERTY = #caseProperty# </if>
<if test="status != null and status !='' "> AND B.CASE_STATUS = #status# </if>
<if test="caseCode != null and caseCode !='' "> AND B.CASE_CODE = #caseCode# </if> <if test="ctmCode != null and ctmCode !='' "> AND B.CTM_CODE = #ctmCode# </if>
<if test="propertyAddr != null and propertyAddr !='' "> AND B.HOUSR_PROPERTY_ADDR LIKE '%'+#propertyAddr#+'%' </if>
<if test="guestname != null and guestname !='' "> AND (B.GUEST_NAME_UP LIKE '%'+#guestname#+'%' OR B.GUEST_NAME_DOWN LIKE '%'+#guestname#+'%') </if>
<if test="proName != null and proName !='' "> AND (B.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F = #proName# OR B.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_B = #proName#) </if>
<if test="agentOrgName != null and agentOrgName !='' "> AND B.GROUP_ORG_ID = #agentOrgName# </if>
<if test="createTimeStart != null and createTimeStart !='' "> AND B.CASE_CREATE_TIME >= #createTimeStart# </if> <if test="createTimeEnd != null and createTimeEnd !='' "> AND B.CASE_CREATE_TIME <= #createTimeEnd# </if>
<if test="resDateStart != null and resDateStart !='' "> AND B.CASE_DISPATCH_TIME >= #resDateStart# </if> <if test="resDateEnd != null and resDateEnd !='' "> AND B.CASE_DISPATCH_TIME <= #resDateEnd# </if>
<if test="realConTimeStart != null and realConTimeStart !='' "> AND B.CASE_REAL_CON_TIME >= #realConTimeStart# </if> <if test="realConTimeEnd != null and realConTimeEnd !='' "> AND B.CASE_REAL_CON_TIME <= #realConTimeEnd# </if>
<if test="realHtTimeStart != null and realHtTimeStart !='' "> AND B.TRANSFER_REAL_HT_TIME >= #realHtTimeStart# </if> <if test="realHtTimeEnd != null and realHtTimeEnd !='' "> AND B.TRANSFER_REAL_HT_TIME <= #realHtTimeEnd# </if>
<if test="realPropertyGetTimeStart != null and realPropertyGetTimeStart !='' "> AND B.CASE_REAL_PROPERTY_GET_TIME >= #realPropertyGetTimeStart# </if> <if test="realPropertyGetTimeEnd != null and realPropertyGetTimeEnd !='' "> AND B.CASE_REAL_PROPERTY_GET_TIME <= #realPropertyGetTimeEnd# </if>
<if test="signDateStart != null and signDateStart !='' "> AND B.MORT_SIGN_DATE >= #signDateStart# </if> <if test="signDateEnd != null and signDateEnd !='' "> AND B.MORT_SIGN_DATE <= #signDateEnd# </if>
<if test="lendDateStart != null and lendDateStart !='' "> AND B.MORT_LEND_DATE >= #lendDateStart# </if> <if test="lendDateEnd != null and lendDateEnd !='' "> AND B.MORT_LEND_DATE <= #lendDateEnd# </if>
<if test="approveTimeStart != null and approveTimeStart !='' "> AND B.CASE_CLOSE_TIME >= #approveTimeStart# </if> <if test="approveTimeEnd != null and approveTimeEnd !='' "> AND B.CASE_CLOSE_TIME <= #approveTimeEnd# </if>
<if test="guohuApproveTimeStart != null and guohuApproveTimeStart !='' "> AND B.TRANSFER_APP_TIME >= #guohuApproveTimeStart# </if> <if test="guohuApproveTimeEnd != null and guohuApproveTimeEnd !='' "> AND B.TRANSFER_APP_TIME <= #guohuApproveTimeEnd# </if>
<if test="isNotResearchCloseCase != null and isNotResearchCloseCase !='' "> AND B.CASE_PROPERTY != '30003002' --结案案件 </if>
<if test="srvCode1 != null and srvCode1 !='' "> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode1#) </if> <if test="srvCode2 != null and srvCode2 !='' "> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode2#) </if> <if test="srvCode3 != null and srvCode3 !='' "> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode3#) </if> <if test="srvCode4 != null and srvCode4 !='' "> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode4#) </if> <if test="srvCode5 != null and srvCode5 !='' "> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode5#) </if> <if test="srvCode6 != null and srvCode6 !='' "> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode6#) </if> <if test="srvCode7 != null and srvCode7 !='' "> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode7#) </if> <if test="srvCode8 != null and srvCode8 !='' "> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode8#) </if> <if test="srvCode9 != null and srvCode9 !='' "> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode9#) </if> <if test="srvCode10 != null and srvCode10 !='' "> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode10#) </if> <if test="srvCode11 != null and srvCode11 !='' "> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode11#) </if> <if test="srvCode12 != null and srvCode12 !='' "> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode12#) </if> <if test="srvCode13 != null and srvCode13 !='' "> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode13#) </if> <if test="srvCode14 != null and srvCode14 !='' "> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode14#) </if> <if test="srvCode15 != null and srvCode15 !='' "> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode15#) </if>
<choose> <when test ="mortageType==0"> AND B.CASE_LOAN_REQ = '0' </when> <when test ="mortageType==1"> AND B.CASE_LOAN_REQ = '1' AND B.MORT_TYPE IN ('30016001','30016002') AND B.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI='1' </when> <when test ="mortageType==2"> AND B.CASE_LOAN_REQ = '1' AND B.MORT_TYPE IN ('30016003') AND B.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI='1' </when> <when test ="mortageType==3"> AND B.CASE_LOAN_REQ = '1' AND B.MORT_TYPE IN ('30016001','30016002') AND B.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI='0' </when> </choose>
